      • Chilling

        public void Chilling(java.util.ArrayList<Human> Humans,
                     Room room,
                     java.util.ArrayList<Animal> Animals)
        Represent Event chilling. By random exist 3 types of chilling event. 1)Play_Computer_Games - use computer (on/of). Then human play. 2)Sleeping - human sleeping 3)Play with animal - take animal who in room and human play with it.
        Parameters:
        Humans - who do event
        room - where do event
        Animals - list with animals who in this room
